JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Financial Controller Europe for Unifeeder, Aarhus
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to take responsibility for financial controlling processes and be an integral part of the development and maturing of a finance department? Are you a curious Financial Controller who wants to make a difference in an international and dynamic organization with great growth potential? Then you might be Unifeeder's new Financial Controller Europe.

betterpeople A/S is on behalf of Unifeeder searching for a Financial Controller Europe to the Unifeeder Headquarter.

Career opportunities in a global environment
As a Financial Controller Europe at Unifeeder, you will be part of a finance department with great development potential where you will get professional and skilled colleagues who challenge each other to find the best solutions. Unifeeder has an energetic work environment which includes a dynamic approach and a strong team spirit among colleagues in both Aarhus, Singapore, Dubai, and Limassol.

This large international organization values procedures and structure, but as a result of their growth journey they are open to updating, reassessing, and changing the way they do things. At Unifeeder, you will work close to the management in an organization with short decision paths and good development opportunities. They offer you a flexible and versatile work life filled with development, challenge, and inspiration.

Financial controlling and optimization of reporting processes
In this position, your tasks will be within the controlling discipline and will for example include monthly financial reporting and financial controlling of Business Units reporting. Furthermore, your tasks involve developing and performing internal financial reports as well as analyses and participating in daily operations in the finance department. You will dive into numbers and data and with a curious mindset seek to set, standardize, optimize and automate financial reporting processes and procedures across the Europe region in accordance with the group guidelines.

Continuously improvement of the utilization of ERP and reporting systems through common master data and common reports together with other departments will be a part of your tasks as well. Moreover, you will participate in meetings in order to communicate the accounts and numbers externally to the rest of the organization. You will refer directly to Unifeeder's Head of Accounting & Controlling Europe.

Experienced controller with solid financial skills
You hold a cand.merc.aud. and have a minimum of 3 years of experience from a similar role, preferably from an international organization with a fast-paced work environment.

You have a business-oriented and analytical mindset, and you have a cross-cultural understanding since you will work together with international colleagues. You master English written and verbally at a professional level and have experience with IFRS.

Unifeeder
Unifeeder Group is a dynamic logistics company, covering Europe, the Middle East, Asia and the Wider Indian Subcontinent. They operate more than 150 vessels and make the way for +5,2 Mio. containers every year.

Unifeeder simplifies the complex tasks of choosing and managing supply chains by providing efficient and sustainable transport solutions. By expanding the network, coming up with innovative solutions and being agile in day-to-day operations, they enable their customers to concentrate on their core business while Unifeeder makes their cargo flow.

As a key player in global and regional supply chains, they recognize their environmental responsibilities and are committed to contributing to the reduction of local, national & global emissions.

The recruitment is handled by betterpeople A/S
The position is to be filled as soon as possible, and we will be processing applications continuously. However, we are willing to wait for the right candidate. If you have any questions, please contact Cecillie Meilby Lyngstrand at e-mail cml@betterpeople.dk. All applications are handled confidentially and with discretion. With reference to the GDPR regulations, applications are ONLY received through the link on our website. If you cannot upload your application through this link, please contact us.

PLEASE NOTE: Our job advertisement is automatically and continuously renewed on job portals until the position is filled. A renewal of the job advertisement is not an expression of a reposting, although it may appear so.

(C) betterpeople A/S
